card_1.cardText:
> “We’re the piggy bank that everybody’s robbing, and that ends.”
> 
> President Trump speaking Saturday at the G-7 summit in Quebec on trade issues with allies. He warned retaliatory tariffs - which countries threatened - would be a mistake. Trump also surprised by suggesting the world should eliminate all tariffs and barriers to promote free trade, despite just imposing tariffs on Europe, Canada & Mexico.

card_2.cardText:
> “Nobody started talking about a meeting between Kim Jong Un and President Trump until we suggested it at the Olympics.”
> 
> Dennis Alan, Pres. Trump impersonator to Associated Press. Alan and Kim Jong Un impersonator, Lee Howard Ho Wun aka "Howard X" traveled to Singapore. Their resemblance to the 2 leaders IS uncanny.

[Click Here To See](http://www.foxnews.com/travel/2018/06/08/singapore-airport-detains-kim-jong-un-impersonator-on-arrival.html)

card_3.cardText:
> “To me, he was a warm person, and you liked to spend time with him because he was interested. He wanted to talk about me and my home … he just didnat talk about himself and his interest in food.a
> 
> 92-year-old Marilyn Hagerty describing Anthony Bourdain, who took his own life last week. Bourdain published a book of Hagerty's food reviews as a North Dakota food critic, after one of her write-ups on a local Olive Garden became a viral sensation.

card_4.cardText:
> aGood deeds come back to help you, and bad deeds come back to haunt you….It felt good to give it to them…They said it restored their faith in humanity.a
> 
> Kal Patel, parents own a "Pit Stop" in Kansas. He tracked down two long-time customers who bought a $1M ticket.

card_10.cardText:
Have a great start to your week!

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/18-06-11-quick-quotes/)
